text:
Zavion Davenport (September 24, 1985 – August 20, 2020), known by his stage name Chi Chi DeVayne, was an American drag queen and reality television personality. She became well known into international attention on the eighth season of "RuPaul's Drag Race" and the third season of "RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars".
DeVayne was born in Shreveport, Louisiana. In July 2020, he was hospitalized for kidney failure in Shreveport. DeVayne died a month later on August 20 from pneumonia at the age of 34.
